casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mickey Vonrice ROLLINS. No. 138PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2009. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rollins. Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of January 2009 by Defendant for Leave to File Reply Brief:

*546"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of January 2009."
